price: 109. Waxay ku dhaartaan Alle midka ugu culus dhaarahooda in hadday u timaaddo calaamo (mucjiso) ay rumaynayaan 6. Dheh: Calaamooyinka sideedaba waxay uun la jiraan oo haya Alle, maxaase idin ogeysiinaya markay (mucjiso) u timaaddo inayan rumayneyn?
arabic: وَأَقۡسَمُواْ بِٱللَّهِ جَهۡدَ أَيۡمَٰنِهِمۡ لَئِن جَآءَتۡهُمۡ ءَايَةٞ لَّيُؤۡمِنُنَّ بِهَاۚ قُلۡ إِنَّمَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۖ وَمَا يُشۡعِرُكُمۡ أَنَّهَآ إِذَا جَآءَتۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ
footnotes: 6. Mushrikiinta waxay ku dhaarteen in hadday arkaan mucjiso ka yimid xagga Alle ay rumeyn, markaasay waxay mu’miniinta jecleysteen oo ka dalbeen Nabiga s.c.w. inuu soo dejiyo mucjisdaas, wuxuu Alle uga jawaabay Aayaddan.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqsamū bil-lahi jahda aymānihim la-in jāathum āyatun layu'minunna bihā qul innamā al-āyātu ʿinda al-lahi wamā yush'ʿirukum annahā idhā jāat lā yu'minūna
